clinical_study.brief_title: MANTA Vascular Closure Device - EU Registry
clinical_study.official_title: Post-Market Clinical Registry to Evaluate the Safety and Performance of MANTA Vascular Closure Device (VCD) Under Real World Conditions in the European Union (EU)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this observational post market study is to compile real world outcome data on the use of the Conformité Européenne (CE) marked MANTA Vascular Closure Device following percutaneous cardiac or peripheral procedures for large bore (10‐18F ID) interventional devices.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately after deployment of MANTA VCD

arm_group.arm_group_label: CE-marked MANTA vascular closure devices per IFU
arm_group.description: Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement (TAVR), Endovascular aneurysm repair (EVAR), TEVAR, etc.

intervention.description: Compile real word data on MANTA VCD.
intervention.arm_group_label: CE-marked MANTA vascular closure devices per IFU

study_pop.textblock: Patients undergoing percutaneous cardiac or peripheral procedures for large bore (10‐18F ID) interventional devices.

criteria.textblock: Per MANTA VCD Instructions for Use (IFU)
